EditContextUpdateText.summary: The updateText() method of the interface updates the internal text content of an EditContext object.

remarks.para: This method doesn't need to be used when the user types text in the associated element. The EditContext object will automatically update its internal text content, and will fire events as needed.
This method can, however, be used when the user interacts with the text content in other ways, such as when pasting text from the clipboard.
